page.title: 20School Life
page.content: We all attend a combined First & Middle School.The age range of the children in the school is from 4+ to 12+ years.There are 28 children in our class aged between 11+ &12+ years.Most classes average 32 children.In our class we study Religious Education English,Maths,French,History,Geography and Science.We also follow less 'academic'subjects including Art,Drama P.E. and Games including Athletics.To help us we have a Television and Video Recorder as well as a BBC B computer with Colour Monitor,Disc Drive & Tape Recorder. Each year the 11+ year olds have the opportunity to visit Le Havre - the French'Twin'city of Southampton.The visit is an educational one and this summer 27 children with 3 Teachers will spend 1 week of term time in France.
